projects.title: FLIGHTS
projects.description: Flights is a backend application which enables flight scheduling, ticket booking, and passenger management functionalities. Applied Microservices in a project to enhance efficiency.

projects.title: COBRA
projects.description: Developed COBRA as part of a team of 5 members, focusing on both frontend and backend functionalities.Implemented features that allow users to create quizzes, participate in them, and receive results upon completion.

projects.title: TWITTER C
projects.description: Developed user authentication, tweet creation, liking, and comment functionalities.Implemented the project in a monolithic architecture.
